data.title: The merger of the Keisei Electric Railway and the Shin-Keisei Electric Railway's railway businesses has been approved.
data.meta_description: OnJune 25th, 2024, Keisei Electric Railway (Headquarters: Ichikawa City, Chiba, President: Toshiya Kobayashi) and Shin-Keisei Electric Railway (Headquarters: Kamagaya City, Chiba, President: Yukihito Mashimo) submitted a merger application for railway business based on the Railway Business Act on May 21st, 2024 (Tuesday), and was approved by the Minister of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism today. From April 1st, 2025 (Tuesday), the Shin-Keisei Line will be operated as our 'Matsudo Line.' After the merger, we will optimize and improve management resources by streamlining management and decision-making processes.
